cards.title: Introducing Polly: Your AI Agent Engineer
cards.tagline: Streamline agent debugging and improve performance with AI assistance
tldr: Polly addresses common PMO challenges in debugging AI agents, enhancing efficiency and performance.
Key features include natural language queries for debugging, analyzing conversations, and prompt engineering.
Implement Polly by integrating it into your LangSmith workflow for immediate benefits.
Use cases include debugging complex agent interactions and optimizing prompt instructions for better outcomes.
